Module jGame

Package jGame.core.entity.component

Component package to hold useful components that can be applied to a Entity, so that there ins't repeated code.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    MovementComponent.MovementAction
    An action to be performed when a specified keybinding is pressed.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CollisionComponent
    The default implementation of a collision component.
    Component
    Base class for any component.
    MovementComponent
    The default implementation of a movement component.
    TransformComponent
    Data component holding various data about an entity's dimensions and positions, etc...
